article_text: Medicaid expansion in Florida has been a contentious issue since 2013 when the Obama administration, through the Affordable Care Act, encouraged states to allow more people with low income to qualify for the health insurance program.

article_metadata.title: Timeline: How Florida’s Medicaid expansion fight paralyzed lawmakers | Miami Herald
